content: अवष्टब्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [अवस्तंभ्-क्त, षत्वम्] {@--1@} Supported; rested on, protected; held, seized. {@--2@} Hanging from or upon; अवष्टब्धा यष्टिः <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--3@} Near, contiguous; अद्यश्वीनावष्टब्धे <ls>P. V. 2. 13</ls>, <ls>Bk. 9. 72.</ls> {@--4@} Obstructed, stopped, suspended. {@--5@} Paralysed. {@--6@} Bound, tied, attached. {@--7@} Wrapped up, enfolded. {@--8@} Opposed. {@--9@} Surpassed, overcome.
